content:
LogFileCreationScheduleOption Enum

Definition

Determines which date to include in the names of the FileLogTraceListener class log files.

In this Article

public enum LogFileCreationScheduleOption
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
LogFileCreationScheduleOption

Remarks

Assign one of the LogFileCreationScheduleOption enumeration values to the LogFileCreationSchedule property to specify which date to include in the names of its log files.

Fields

Daily

Include the current date in the log file name.
None

Do not include the date in the log file name.
Weekly

Include the first day of the current week in the log file name.
